Collector Yumi: Ah, Newyear sent you, did he? I'm glad you came. I've been waiting for you. How is the old boy? Surely he could have sent some food with you. Would that have been too much to expect of him? Honestly. Well, no matter. Let's discuss business. [Quest _121_PavelTheGiants collecter_yumi_q0121_0201.htm|"Ask what needs to be done."]
